feed.title: Combined summary - Fwd: Your bit4coin order

entry.title: Combined summary - Fwd: Your bit4coin order
entry.summary: The email is informing the recipient about a purchase of a bit4coin voucher and states that the wallet has been successfully added. The total cost, including shipping and handling, is â‚¬193.00. Payment is requested via SEPA bank transfer to bit4coin BV's ABN AMRO account with reference number 1WZ. The email advises the recipient to track the payment and mentions that they will be informed as soon as the payment is received.In addition, the email provides a support email address for any potential questions or concerns. However, the sender suspects that this may be a fraud and would like to report it. The sender acknowledges that there may not be much that can be done to stop such scams.
